entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: S 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
